sentence.idiomatic: He can really sweet talk.
Whatever you do, don't be fooled by his sweet talk.
Who doesn't like to listen to sweet talk?
Do you think he is honest and dependable?
He really is a very frank person.
She is a very honest and dependable worker, you don't have to worry.
In his letter he expressed his love to her.
I'm not able to use Chinese to express what I want to say well.
What kind of point of view does this paragraph express?
She received a love letter yesterday.
He has never written a love letter before.
I peeked at the love letter he wrote.
No matter what I say, he still isn't willing to lend me that thing.
No matter what you say, the person you love the most is yourself.
No matter how he says it, we simply shouldn't believe him.
I saw the president today. It was truly exciting.
I'm not at all excited about going to Shanghai. I've been there five times before.
When do you get excited the most?
When you are tired, you can take some vitamins.
She bought a bottle of vitamins.
Do you think that taking vitamins is beneficial?

word.literal: measure word (for a mouthful of something)

sentence.idiomatic: I drank a sip of water.
There are a few sips of milk left, do you want them?
He didn't drink even a mouthful of tea.
Lili, I’m over here. Was traffic bad again?
Darn it! I made you wait again. There are really too many cars on the road.
That’s why I said I’d come meet you. Fighting traffic like that is so tiring. Here, have a drink of water.
Actually, it’s fine. I’m used to it. You’ve been working a lot of overtime lately though. You need to watch your health. Make sure to take some extra vitamins.
You’re my best vitamin. As soon as I see you, I’m filled with excitement and all of my weariness is gone.
Huh! You said the same thing in your letter. You keep saying that! That’s your only good line!
Well, you can see that I’m no smooth talker. It’s my first time writing a love letter, so I really didn’t know how to express myself. But you understand my heart.
Actually I just like it when you are real, like this. What’s so great about sweet talk anyway?
You truly understand me. These past few days, I keep worrying that you will think I am too straightforward. Lili, in my heart there’s only you.
All right, all right. If you say it one more time, I’m going to stop paying any attention to you.
